meanings.definition: A container or package for storing or transporting goods.
meanings.sent1: I placed the cookies in a paks to keep them fresh.
meanings.sent2: The delivery truck was filled with various paks of different sizes.
meanings.sent3: Tom accidentally sat on the paks, thinking it was a stool!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed from the paks as she hid inside during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent5: The colorful paks stood out among the plain boxes in the warehouse.

meanings.definition: To compress or compact something tightly.
meanings.sent1: She had to paks her clothes into the suitcase for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The machine can paks the materials together to save space.
meanings.sent3: He tried to paks all his toys into the small box, but it wouldn't fit!
meanings.sent4: The snowstorm seemed to paks the town under a thick white blanket.
meanings.sent5: The chef used his hands to paks the dough into a perfect ball.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a person's belongings or possessions.
meanings.sent1: She carried her paks in a backpack wherever she went.
meanings.sent2: His paks were neatly organized on the shelves in his room.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the paks, scattering items all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: His guitar case was his most treasured paks, filled with memories.
meanings.sent5: The thief quickly grabbed the paks and ran off into the night.
